t: Amazon Logo and its History | LogoMyWay
s: On top of the word Amazon.com, the words, “Books, Music & More” were spelled out in light grey font. This design stuck around until the year 2000, when Jeff Bezo rolled out the logo that the company has been using ever since, the famous Amazon.com with a curved arrow beneath it.
